caption.p:
Effect of daily administration of aqueous soluble fraction of A. tenuifolius (AS-AT 300 mg/kg) for 7 days on (a) urine output, (b) Na + excretion, and (c) K + excretion. Results are stated as mean ± SEM, whereas
∗∗ = P < 0.01 and
∗∗∗ = P < 0.001 when compared to the normal saline- (NS-) treated group. All data are subjected to two-way ANOVA followed by Bonferroni posttest. HCTZ = hydrochlorothiazide.
